
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut)
target_compile_options(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/client/server
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  core-client-server
  cpp-testing-gmock_in_unittest
  ydb-core-persqueue
  ydb-core-tablet_flat
  core-testlib-default
  core-testlib-actors
)
target_link_options(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)
target_sources(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/client/server/msgbus_server_pq_metarequest_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  20
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)
target_allocator(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(contrib-ydb-core-client-server-ut)
